name: Derrick Anthony POLLY, petitioner, v. TEXAS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Derrick Anthony POLLY, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Derrick Anthony POLLY, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
No. 13-9695.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 23, 2014.
Case below, 2010 WL 1254843.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
